name: Silent Knight Fight
description:
In this game, you and your buddies can squash evil snowmen as well as dig holes to hide in or use as traps. You can play it here with no download required. As the name suggests, you play as a knight, you fight snowmen, and the game is totally silent. Please note that this is our first multiplayer game, and that there will be bugs. You can report any bugs on our website.

CONTROLS

    A and D or left and right arrows to move.

    Spacebar, W or up arrow to jump.

    Left click to ground pound. Do this over snowmen to squash them, and over snow to dig.
